alert.note: Alert for Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:23PM MST until December 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Wednesday to 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow on Wednesday may significantly reduce visibility and cause partial lane blockages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
